tool_description: Monitors and evaluates carrier compliance with service level agreements, tracking violations and trends.

delivery_analysis_id.description: Reference ID for delivery time analysis results

compliance_period.description: Period for compliance evaluation: daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly

error_messages: Invalid delivery analysis ID: The provided analysis reference cannot be found or has expired.
Invalid SLA definition: SLA definitions must include metric type, threshold, and penalty structure.
Invalid compliance period: Use daily, weekly, monthly, or quarterly.
Insufficient data for SLA evaluation: Not enough delivery data available for the specified compliance period.
usage: Provide delivery_analysis_id and define SLA requirements in sla_definitions. Set compliance_period to match your evaluation schedule.

compliance_rates.description: Compliance rates by carrier and SLA type (percentage)

violation_summary.description: Summary of SLA violations and their impact

trend_analysis.description: Trends in compliance performance over time
